name: Knightmare (itch) (Games Development - IADE-UE)
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2020/2021).

Developed by:

  • Matheus Pierrobom
  • Ricardo Marques
  • Tomás Sousa

Controls:

  • A or Left arrow - Move Left
  • D or Right arrow - Move Right
  • W or Up arrow - Jump
  • S or Down arrow - Fall down platforms
  • Left Mouse Button or Z - Basic attack
  • Right Mouse Button or X - Magic attack
  • Space - Dash

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
